articles.content: Mumbai: Saudi Arabias push to restrain oil supply to buoy prices is spurring India to speed up plans to diversify its crude sources and pursue alternative energy, the chairman of one of the nations b… [+2661 chars]

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: Trai puts on hold for a week new norms on business text messages - Times of India
articles.description: India Business News: Telecom regulator Trai on Tuesday suspended the newly-implemented norms for commercial text messages for one week, following major disruptions in SMS

articles.title: LPG price has doubled in 7 years, and the subsidies are gone too - Times of India
